ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Currently employed
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -99= N/A ; 88= Missing ; 77= Refused

ElementDescription: How interested are you in your occupation?
Notes: 1= Very; 2= Moderately; 3= A Little; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: How interested are you in your home-related activities
Notes: 1= Very; 2= Moderately; 3= A Little; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: Do you pursue these home-related activities with
Notes: 1= A lot of enjoyment; 2= some enjoyment; 3= only a little enjoyment; 4= no enjoyment at all

ElementDescription: Are you interested in hobbies, leisure?
Notes: 1= Very; 2= Moderately; 3= A Little; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: Is the quality of your spare time
Notes: 1= Very good; 2= Good; 3= Fair; 4= Unsatisfactory

ElementDescription: How frequently do you seek contacts with your family members (spouse, children, parents, etc.)
Notes: 1= Very frequently; 2= frequently; 3= rarely; 4= never

ElementDescription: Is the state of relations in your family
Notes: 1= Very good; 2= Good; 3= Fair; 4= Unsatisfactory

ElementDescription: Outside your family, do you have relationships with others?
Notes: 1= Many People; 2= Some people; 3= Only a few people; 4= Nobody

ElementDescription: Do you try to form relationships with others
Notes: 1= Very actively; 2= Actively; 3= Moderately Actively; 4= In no active way

ElementDescription: How, in general, do you rate your relations with other people?
Notes: 1= Very good; 2= Good; 3= Fair; 4= Unsatisfactory

ElementDescription: What value do you attach to your relationships with others?
Notes: 1= Great Value; 2= Some Value; 3= Only a little; 4= No value at all

ElementDescription: How often do people in your social circle seek contact with you?
Notes: 1= Very often; 2= Often; 3= Rarely; 4= Never

ElementDescription: Do you observe the social rule, good manners, politeness, etc.?
Notes: 1= Always; 2= Most of the time; 3= Rarely; 4= Never

ElementDescription: To what extent are you involved in community life (church, club, etc)
Notes: 1= Fully; 2= Moderately; 3= Slightly; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: Do you like searching for information about things, situations, and people to improve your understanding of them?
Notes: 1= Very much; 2= Moderately; 3= Not much; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: Are you interested in scientific, technical, and cultural information?
Notes: 1= Very; 2= Moderately; 3= Only Slightly; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: How often do you find it difficult to express your opinions to people?
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Always

ElementDescription: How often do you feel rejected from your circle
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Always

ElementDescription: How important do you consider your physical appearance
Notes: 1= Very; 2= Moderately; 3= Not very much; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: To what extent do you have problems in managing your resources and income
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Always

ElementDescription: Do you feel able to organize your environment according to your wishes and needs
Notes: 1= Very much so; 2= Moderately; 3= Not very; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: SASS 6 item subscore
SASS Total Score
SASS Mean Score
